introduction:
Your car suddenly stops working.
There is an old cottage up the hill, you walk to it in search of some shelter from the storm.
As you knock, the door creaks open... With hesitance you enter.

WHAM!

The door slams shut!
You adjust to the darkness and look at your surroundings...

rooms.description:
You are in what used to be the main hallway, or at least you think so.
There is dirt all over the tiled floor and plants growing through its many cracks.
The wallpaper is barely visible due to it being covered with graffiti.
The room has a strong atmosphere of being 'abandoned'.

This room must have been a living room of some kind.
A rotting couch sits in a corner, and the remnants of what used to be a table stand in the middle of the room.

The floor is wet and sticky, red slime sticks to your shoes.
The crimson, shiny walls seem to pulse slightly.
The room is filled with a thin mist, the reddish tones of the room are still clearly visible however.

You are in a very old kitchen.
Rotten meat hangs from the ceiling, some of the flesh might be of human origin.

The room is filled to the brim with fauna.
The ceiling seems to be hidden behind the thick leaves of tall trees.
The hot moist air makes you sweat.
You appear to be in some decrepit storage space.
A beautifully room, covered with all sorts of flowers from the floor up to the ceiling.

This rooms is covered with black little specks,
on closer inspection they seem like dead partially-consumed flea's.

The air is difficult to breathe, and the smell is even more horrible.
The room is covered in fungi.
The walls of this room are covered with the legs of insects, from top to bottom.

You are deafened by the sound of chirping birds.
Pictures of a growing tree hang on the almost completely overgrown wall.

The room glitters and shines brightly.
On the ceiling there is a beautiful diamond chandelier,
sparkling light onto the diamond walls and floor.

The room glitters dimly.
The diamond walls and floor are illuminated via the light creeping in through the stone archway.
A long hallway, the walls are made of cobblestone and are illuminated using large torches.

A square cobblestone room, thick wooden beams hold up the ceiling.
The air smells somewhat humid.

The floor is slippery and wet.
Along the edges of the room there are drains, catching water flowing from stone mouths carved in the wall.

A wooden floor creaks under your feet.
Underneath the floor there seems to be a strong current of water.
There is a table to the far end of the room.
The floor is made out of soggy velvet, the walls are stone but equally moist.

An old dirty bathroom, some tiles are broken and mould is growing on the ceiling.
The mirror on the wall is shattered and all water taps are running.

items.name: Note
items.description: The note says: 'Sorry, we're all home! Please stay forever.'

items.name: Bone Key
items.description:
A white key, seemingly made from bone.
It has a skull engraved on it, and the length of the key looks like a spine.

items.name: Top-hat
items.description: A sleek black hat. The label inside says it belongs to a certain Mr. Mashington.

items.name: SupaSalt
items.description: A big sack of SupaSalt (TM)! 'Puts the Supa in your Salt!'.

items.name: Wooden key
items.description: A beautifully carved wooden key, small animals are engraved in its sides.

items.name: Banana peel
items.description: A slippery brown slimy skin, only the rough shape is a subtle reminder of the fruit that was once contained within.

items.name: Flea Killer
items.description: A full bottle of Grim Creeper (TM) 'Kills Flea's with a single drop of sweet, sweet death juice!'.

items.name: Poisoned Flea Meat
items.description: A tiny speck of meat, you'd think it was dust.

items.name: Large Ladybug Leg
items.description: The front leg of a giant ladybug.

items.name: Fungus
items.description: Yellow fungus, it seems to ooze dark purple fluid. It tends to get excited whenever it's near wood.

items.name: Stone key
items.description: A heavy key mainly made out of granite, although the handle seems to be decorated with many smaller stones.

items.name: Large stone
items.description: The head of a broken stone statue, on its face is a look of surprise frozen in time.

items.name: Water key
items.description: A silver key with a droplet-shaped lapis stone on the handle.

items.name: Handgun
items.description: The gun seems to be a 'Colt Peacemaker', made around 1873. It's old and rusted, but it might still work.

items.name: Velvet key
items.description: A key covered in wet velvet, its teeth show that its made of iron from the inside.

items.name: Golden key
items.description: A shiny gold-plated key. It feels warm and reassuring in your hand.

entities.name: Meat monster
entities.description: It looks like a skinless man wearing a top-hat, but bloated an angry. It makes you feel sick.
entities.attack: The thing grips you tightly. You feel your clothes soak with blood and pus. Your skin starts to melt.
entities.die: The skinless man screeches, shrivels up, and dies.

entities.name: Bald ghost
entities.description: A translucent man, screaming for his lost top-hat.
entities.attack: The ghost rips off your head and tries to wear you as a hat.
entities.die: The ghost thanks you kindly, and passes on in a fashionable state.

entities.name: Vicious Flea
entities.description: A tiny flea, but something about it makes you feel fear you've never felt before.
entities.attack: The flea jumps into your eye-socket and worms its way into your brain, you start scratching your brains out to make the itching stop.
entities.die: The Flea makes a tiny squeak, shrivels up and dies.

entities.name: Giant Ladybug
entities.description: A huge ladybug, it almost fills the room. It has hunger in its eyes.
entities.attack: The ladybug stabs you with its front leg and pulls you towards its gaping mouth. The last thing you hear is an audible sound of disappointment as you are tossed to the side with your guts hanging out.
entities.die: You hear a large choking sound as the ladybug whimpers and becomes motionless.

entities.name: Old Tree
entities.description: The ancient tree stands tall within the middle of the room, it's many branches covered with birds.
entities.attack: The tree shakes its branches vividly, and as a result a torrent of birds swoops down at you. You die through the cuts of a thousand beaks.
entities.die: The fungus feasts on the tree, growing faster than you've ever seen fungus grow. The tree and birds quickly rot and decay into black ooze.

entities.name: Glass Statue
entities.description: A stern, muscly looking fellow. It's features are well defined in somewhat brittle glass, but it's definitely a statue.
entities.attack: As you blink, the glass statue slashes your artery with its sharp nails. Your blood sparkles among the glass and diamond.
entities.die: The glass statue slips backwards and falls on the hard diamond floor. It smashes to a thousand tiny pieces.

entities.name: Stone Statue
entities.description: A broadly smiling, muscly looking woman. It's features are well defined in solid stone, but it's definitely a statue.
entities.attack: As you blink, you hear hear an audible *SNAP* as your neck is pulverized by two cold stone hands. Your eyes never open.
entities.die: The stone statue slips forwards and falls head-first on the hard diamond floor. It smashes to multiple large pieces.

entities.name: Half-stone Man
entities.description: The man is gargling and screaming, half is body and face is turned to stone. It looks painful.
entities.attack: The man stumbles towards you and grabs your hand. The stone spreads from your hand to the rest of your body. You breathe your last breath as your lungs turn solid and cold.
entities.die: The stone covering the half-stone man shatters, making the man drop to the ground. His death is a swift but unpleasant one.

entities.name: Drowned Zombie
entities.description: With a rattling breath, the undead woman gargles words you cannot hear.
entities.attack: The woman grips you tightly and pushes your face into a puddle. You slowly drown as you fail to overthrow her undead strength.
entities.die: As you shoot her in the head, her body becomes limp and splats down on the wet floor. Finally resting.

entities.name: Old lady
entities.description: A hunchbacked woman somewhere in her 80's, limply holding a bucket in her left hand. Her face is difficult to see through long strands of wet hair.
entities.attack: The old lady throws her bucket over your head in one quick swoop. You don't know where the thick black liquid is coming from, but it fills your lungs. You die struggling to breathe water.
entities.die: You shoot the old woman through her heart, making her drop the bucket and fall limp to the ground. The bucket smashes to pieces on the floor.

entities.name: Ragged man
entities.description: A skinny, pale young man, his clothes are old and torn. He's holding two large knifes in both his hands.
entities.attack: 'I'm sorry', the young man says as he stabs you in the chest. He whispers 'You almost made it...' as the life drains from your body.
entities.die: You shoot the ragged man in his neck, making him stumble backwards. A second mercy shot makes him fall to the ground as his knifes turn to ashes.

reset:
Darkness...
Total darkness...
Then suddenly a shocking flash of light.
As you slowly adjust your eyes, you see where you are.
win: The fresh air fills your lungs. You got out!
